caption.p: Comparison of expression results from RNA-Seq (log 10 of normalized counts) and RT-qPCR (Relative expression) methods for DcMyb6, DcMyb7 and their corresponding lncNATs. Data are means ± SD of three biological replicates. For RT-qPCR, carrot actin-7 was used as reference gene and ‘Purple phloem’ as reference sample. ND not detected.
